reviewText: great harryhausen effects, some of the dialogue is hokey. all in all good films
Wonderful movies.  The whole family loves the creatures.

Hero full of his classic movies from the late 1950s and early 70s you get three Sinbad movies and Jason and the Argonauts at a great price. If you are fans of Ray harryhausen you're going to love this box set it is a must own. For some reason it says region full on the box but it does play on American DVDs players. These movies never grow old they get better with age.
Excellent films.  I have always been a fan of Ray Harryhausen's work.

DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU HAVE A BLUE RAY PLAYER! I bought this as a listed "DVD" collection by Amazon that was described as playable on both dvd & blue ray. It's ONLY for blue ray. About Ray Harryhausen-- if his name is on it, it's awesome. Period.
